title: Change what you see in At a Glance on Pixel – Here’s how
content:
At a Glance has recently undergone a new facelift, adding multiple new options and alerts to the productivity feature for your . That being said, you might want to go in and customize what you actually see on your At a Glance. Here’s how to do that.
